title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get a message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Also, I would like to understand what the message means.
SR: To reproduce, hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant).
